short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DialPlug Dialer is an integrated app make for inbound and outbound calls using Bitrix24 CRM.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A CRM integrated Chrome Extension

DialPlug Dialer chrome extension is an integrated application developed to initiate Inbound and Outbound calls using Bitrix24 CRM.

This chrome extension helps to call from CRM and sync with all the existing call records. Data such as call recordings, call logs, call duration and other information in CRM reflects with in no time. 

This chrome extension is reliable, flexible, and lightweight extension. It requires Bitrix24 CRM account to make inbound and outbound calls. Yes, it is user friendly and easy to navigate and use.

DialPlug Dialer chrome extension and CRM will enhance your business and marketing accomplishment with the existing features in CRM:

★ Import the leads and effortlessly turn them into campaigns for your agents to immediately start calling.

★ Maximize your agent talk times with the help of call outcome disposition reporting.

★ Listen to agent calls live, whisper or even barge-in.

★ Drop pre-recorded voicemails when answering machines are reached.

★ Place your daily calls into an automated list.

★ High Quality Performance for Inbound and Outbound Calls.

★ Call more than 3x as many people daily.

★ Record inbound and outbound calls automatically.

★ Search, download and listen to MP3 files, stored for all the recorded calls in seconds in CRM.

★ Set up your press-number IVR for routing customers to a group, direct extension or an outside phone number.

★ Automate your voicemails throughout the day, so that you can get through more calls, and reach more prospects.

★ Use this world class tool to boost your call pickup rates.

★ Ensure that no inbound lead gets unanswered.

★ Customize and upload, Music on Hold (MOH) to advertise while the customer is waiting for the representative to answer the call. 

DialPlug Dialer chrome extension by DialPlug does not spy on users to collect any data on usage, browser history or track their movements on the web. the extension cannot add any badges, icons, banners, or anything else to a website. So, no impact on anyone’s page load time.

How to install and  use DialPlug dialer chrome extension:

Installing and using the extension is super-fast and easy. In the chrome web store, click the “Add to Chrome” button in the upper right corner and then click the “Add extension” button that pops up. 

Enter the DialPlug Domain (which is provide by DialPlug after the subscription) in the text box and Bitrix24 CRM Account URL and submit. 
All you need to do now is, enter the username and password of agents (which is also provided when subscribed with dialplug.com).

Once connected with domain, just use connector for login to extension. 

After successful login, you are ready to dial out through leads, contacts, company details.
